channel.title: Safe Zones in satans isle
channel.description:
Ok so iv got satans isle and i need iw ould like to know how to make safe zones...
i tried doing it myself in a zone that has wildy lvl instead of the DANGER signe but i think i added it wrong and it didnt work :'(
Can sum 1 help
(no cant code it with color )
this is the section i edited
public boolean inSafezone() { // by i loot i if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2882 && absX <=2821 && absY >=10233 && absY <=10192 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; }
~soalreaver~

item.title: Safe Zones in satans isle
item.dc:creator: @Devil_Cry Devil Cry
item.description:
@Devil_Cry wrote:

Ok so iv got satans isle and i need iw ould like to know how to make safe zones…

i tried doing it myself in a zone that has wildy lvl instead of the DANGER signe but i think i added it wrong and it didnt work :’(

Can sum 1 help

(no cant code it with color )

this is the section i edited

public boolean inSafezone() { // by i loot i
if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2882 && absX <=2821 && absY >=10233 && absY <=10192 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 ))
return true;
else
return false;
}

~soalreaver~
